snippet: The new charges involve accusations that Oscar Pistorius discharged a weapon in a restaurant in January and also fired a gun from a car while driving home from a vacation.
abstract: South African Paralympian Oscar Pistorius will face new charges when he appears in court for trial hearing on charges that he murdered girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp; new charges involve accusations that he discharged a weapon in a restaurant in January 2013 and also fired a gun from a car while driving home from a vacation, both incidents occurring before Steenkamp was killed in February.
lead_paragraph: The new charges involve accusations that Oscar Pistorius discharged a weapon in a restaurant in January and also fired a gun from a car while driving home from a vacation.

headline.main: South Africa: Pistorius to Face New Gun Charges
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Awaiting Murder Trial, Athlete Faces New Weapons Charges
